parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The keys that you want to match in the filter.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 99. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SortDirection
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the results. Valid values:

*   **ASCEND**: sorts the results in ascending order
*   **DESCEND** (default value): sorts the results in descending order

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the data source. Valid values:

*   **ECS_FILE**: Elastic Compute Service (ECS) files
*   **OSS**: Object Storage Service (OSS) buckets
*   **NAS**: Apsara File Storage NAS file systems
*   **OTS**: Tablestore instances
*   **UDM_ECS**: ECS instances
*   **UDM_ECS_DISK**: ECS disks
